Includes cracks and cracked dedicated server files for the following games:
-Mount&Blade Warband v1.158 or later
-Mount&Blade Napoleonic Wars v1.104 or later

The cracks are automatically updated and will work with any newer game versions!

#################################
How to crack the game:
1) If you don't have these game(s), you can download them for free from www.taleworlds.com :
Warband: www.taleworlds.com/main.aspx?dir=download.aspx?type=2
Napoleonic Wars: www.taleworlds.com/main.aspx?dir=download.aspx?type=5
2) Run the automatic crack installer and select the Mount&Blade folder.
3) Enjoy FREE MULTIPLAYER (and single player) in all games from the Mount&Blade series!

#################################
How to host your own, dedicated server:
ONLY follow this guide if you want to host a dedicated server, otherwise use the in-game 'host' option!
-Run 'Mount&Blade Dedicated Server' (or 'Dedicated_Server_Launcher.exe' from the game folder) and follow
 the on-screen instructions.
-Start the game, you will find your own server under Multiplayer->Join->Source: Local Area Network
 (Others will see your server on the regular server list from the internet.)
-If the server is not visible to others, forward port 7240 (UDP and TCP) on your router!

[ A more detailed guide is at http://ub3r.1337.cx/register ]

#################################
How to use the dual server extension:
This package includes a special extension that will allow you to play on the official servers
provided that you have a VALID serial key for desired game (otherwise the regular crack will be used).
To enable, run "enable dual server extension.bat" and choose the game(s).

#################################
